page.title: 03A Typical Day Cont.
page.content: or art.We leave school at 3.40pm. I usually play in the park across the road for a few minutes and I get home at 4.00. I watch the childrens programmes, then have tea which is usually chips and beefburgers. At five o'clock I usually go out and play down the park by my house. I usually ask my mother to call me at 7.00 or 6.30 when I come up and watch television until 9.30. Then I may read, do some tapestry, my homework or my piano or guitar practice. After, I have supper of baked beans and I usually go to bed 10.00 and read a book. Sleep eventually arrives about 11.00.
